brief: Johaug and Klaebo headline Norway's Olympic gold rush in Milano-Cortina this week.
Liverpool visit Sunderland in crucial title race clash while Arsenal lead by six.
Hovland tees off at legendary Pebble Beach as Norwegian winter stars chase medals.
